mapper.insert: insert into party_board values( NVL((SELECT MAX(p_board_id) from party_board),0)+1, #{p_id}, #{u_id}, #{p_board_content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: select b.p_board_id, b.p_id, b.u_id, u.u_nickname, b.p_board_content, b.p_board_created from party_board b LEFT OUTER JOIN users u on b.u_id = u.u_id where p_id=#{p_id,jdbcType= VARCHAR} order by b.p_board_created asc
